title: Question 12
prompt: Tara and Steve woke at 6:00 a.m. and went for a hike with their dog. During the hike, they took pictures of vultures, eagles, and blue herons.  ____________________.  After their hike, they stopped at a diner to have lunch and hydrate.
description: Read the paragraph.  Then choose the sentence that best fills the blank in the paragraph.
feedback: The best choice to fill in the blank is, “They also captured a picture of a family of macaws.” The paragraph tells a story in chronological order. It makes sense that, during the hike after they start taking pictures, the couple take a picture of macaws.  The other choices don’t fit at this point in the story. The couple is not just waking up, and they’ve already started the hike, so they’re not driving up the mountain. They haven’t had lunch yet, so it doesn’t make sense to mention dinner at this point.
